name: AyurvedaClock-Lifestyle|DailyRoutine|Time
0:
”Alexa open ayurveda clock”
”What should I do at 12 PM”
”When should I take dinner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ayurveda clock
des:
Ask Ayurveda Clock about daily routine according to ayurveda. 
You can know when should you do which activity. 
For eg. You can ask, "When should I take lunch?"

You can know what should you do at certain time. 
For eg. "What should I do at 10 P. M. ?"

This Alexa skill will provide information according to Ayurveda. 

Skill will be updated in next version to provide suggestions based on your body type.

Disclaimer: Time Table defers based on country, time and conditions. You should apply suggestions only after taking suggestion from your ayurvedic doctor according to your body type.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
